paragraph.value: Figure 4 shows the accuracy of two systems for different NER (named entity recognition) types. We consider four types: location (LOC), organization (ORG), person (PER), and miscellany (MICS). These types are given in CoNLL 2003 dataset, which was used as a basis for AIDA CoNLL. Our model is accurate for PER, achieving accuracy of about 97%, only 0.53% lower than the supervised model.
